events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it does not fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The reported case involves a refund request due to size issues with the purchased jacket.
Assigning this refund-related case to the returns department for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to help you with your return and refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the item has been worn or damaged in any way?
Sure, my order number is #45321789. The jacket is brand new; I just tried it on and decided it’s too small.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate the refund process once you send the jacket back. We will email you a prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for your quick response and assistance!
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully. Please allow 3–5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received your refund and if everything else is satisfactory with your return experience.
Yes, the refund arrived yesterday. Thank you for the hassle-free process and your excellent support.
Closing the case now as the refund has been received and the customer has expressed satisfaction.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.
